name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Dynamic Senior Sales Engineer with a robust background in business development and technical sales, leveraging 9+ years of experience in the technology sector to provide innovative solutions in water treatment processes. Proficient in delivering effective strategies for filtration, softening, reverse osmosis, dewatering, and wastewater treatment solutions. Expertise in customer relationship management (CRM) and proposal management, coupled with strong communication and collaboration skills. Demonstrated ability to manage projects effectively while adhering to EMEA regulations and sustainability practices. Notable proficiency with Microsoft Office tools to support proposal and project documentation. Skilled in utilizing technical insights to enhance customer engagement and drive sales performance.
